kw.msg:
GET Response : url=https://www.metaweather.com/api/location/search/?query=Helsinki status=404, reason=Not Found headers={'Content-Length': '272', 'Content-Type': 'text/html; charset=UTF-8', 'Date': 'Sat, 13 Aug 2022 11:48:58 GMT'} body= 404 Page not found

test.doc: This test case verifies response code of GET request is 200 response body contains the title key with value "Helsinki" and response body contains the key "location_type"
